translations: 侵略分子的，强硬外交政策的；极端爱国主义的

sentences.sentence: The new attitude towards America was captured in 2000 by a jingoistic film called "Brother 2".
sentences.translation: 对美国的这种新态度在2000年的一部狭隘国家主义电影《兄弟2》中表现了出来。

sentences.sentence: It is not a jingoistic call to arms. It mentions China only in passing, and it never explicitly addresses the reality that China has already become a big power.
sentences.translation: 它并未发出穷兵黩武的号召，只是一带而过提到中国，从未明确提及中国已成为强国的事实。

sentences.sentence: Some will, Shawcross has been called up the England squad which affords a player a certain amount of protection from the most jingoistic and snide journalists.
sentences.translation: 肖克罗斯被招进英格兰国家队，国家队给他提供了一个不被记着骚扰的环境。
